title-group.article-title: Generators and Irreducible Polynomials Over Finite Fields

abstract.p: Weil's character sum estimate is used to study the problem of constructing generators for the multiplicative group of a finite field. An application to the distribution of irreducible polynomials is given, which confirms an asymptotic version of a conjecture of Hansen-Mullen.
